attributes.action: Make London the OFFICIAL CAPITAL of the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details: It would strengthen the union and keep the UK alive.
attributes.background: Make London the official capital of the UK as there is no document about it.

rejection.details: A capital city is normally determined by where a nation's government and parliament reside, and it's not clear what you want the Government to do to make London's status as the UK's capital "official".
